ticker.title: The exchange symbol that this item is traded under.

market.title: The market in which this ticker participates.

locale.title: The locale of where this ticker is traded.

currency.title: The currency this ticker is traded in.

active.title: Whether or not the ticker is active. False means the ticker has been delisted.

primaryExch.title: The listing exchange for this ticker.

url.title: A URL that can be used to get more detailed information about the ticker.

updated.title: The last time this ticker record was updated.
